layout.text: Welcome to Traditional Rawhide Braiders! Hundreds of new quality products, including romal reins, bosals, and accessories, have finally arrived! We are very busy now preparing these beautiful items for you to purchase. We thank you again for your patience and will look forward to filling your orders. If you have questions, please email us at drb2387@aol.com, or call our business office at (817) 295-5024. We appreciate your business!
